data.name: Wooser's Hand-to-Mouth Life: Wooser's hand to mouth life is back again
data.short_description: This is the tale of an unknown hero. Once day, Wooser leaves for deep space, risking his life to protect the things he loves. ... Probably the things he loves are money, meat, and girls. Also uniforms. But there are those who love him anyway: Rin, and Ren. When the wish they made on a starry sky
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
